00094   mPeriod=theModel.period();
00095   mProjection=theModel.projection();

00097   mNorthing=theModel.northing();

00101   mPrecision=theModel.precision();
00102   mDietPercent=theModel.dietPercent();
00103   mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops=theModel.plantPercent();

00198 float LaModel::requiredValue(QString theAnimalGuid)
00199 {   // this is the generic animal model
00200   LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(theAnimalGuid);
00201   float myAnimalProductionTarget;// = getProductionTargetsAnimals (theAnimalGuid, static_cast <float> (mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value (theAnimalGuid)));
00202   float myAnimalsRequired=(myAnimalProductionTarget / myAnimal.killWeight()) / (myAnimal.usableMeat()*.01);
00203   float myBirthsPerYear = 365.0 / (myAnimal.gestationTime() + myAnimal.estrousCycle() + myAnimal.weaningAge());
00204   float myOffspringPerMotherYearly = myBirthsPerYear * myAnimal.youngPerBirth() * (1.0-(0.01*myAnimal.deathRate()));
00205   float myMothersNeededStepOne = myAnimalsRequired/myOffspringPerMotherYearly;
00206   float myMalesStepOne = (myMothersNeededStepOne * myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2.;
00207   float myFemalesStepOne = myMalesStepOne;
00208   float myMotherReplacementsPerYear = myMothersNeededStepOne/myAnimal.breedingExpectancy();
00209   float myAdditionalMothers = (myMotherReplacementsPerYear/myOffspringPerMotherYearly)*2.;
00210   float myMalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2.;
00211   float myFemalesStepTwo = (myAdditionalMothers*myOffspringPerMotherYearly)/2.;
00212   float myTotalMothers = myMothersNeededStepOne+myAdditionalMothers;
00213   float myTotalMales = myMalesStepOne+myMalesStepTwo;
00214   float myTotalFemales = myFemalesStepOne-myFemalesStepTwo;
00215   float myTotalJuveniles = myTotalMales+myTotalFemales;
00216   float myTotalMothersValueRequired = myTotalMothers * myAnimal.gestating();
00217   float myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired = myTotalJuveniles * myAnimal.juvenile();
00218   float myValueNeededToFeedAnimals = myTotalMothersValueRequired + myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired;
00219   float myReturnValue = static_cast<float>(myValueNeededToFeedAnimals);
00220 
00221     // log report
00222   logMessage("method ==> float LaModel::requiredValue(QString theAnimalGuid)");
00223   logMessage("animal prodn target = calorie target of animal / food value");
00224   logMessage("mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value(theAnimalGuid): " + QString::number(mCaloriesProvidedByMeatMap.value(theAnimalGuid)).toLocal8Bit());
00225   logMessage("myAnimal.meatFoodValue(): " + QString::number(myAnimal.meatFoodValue()/1000.).toLocal8Bit());
00226   logMessage("myAnimalProductionTarget = " + QString::number(myAnimalProductionTarget).toLocal8Bit());
00227   logMessage("slaughter animals reqd: " + QString::number(myAnimalsRequired).toLocal8Bit());
00228   logMessage("BirthEventsPerYear: " + QString::number(myBirthsPerYear).toLocal8Bit());
00229   logMessage("OffspringPerMotherYearly = " + QString::number(myOffspringPerMotherYearly).toLocal8Bit());
00230   logMessage("MothersNeededStepOne = " + QString::number(myMothersNeededStepOne).toLocal8Bit());
00231   logMessage("MalesStepOne = " + QString::number(myMalesStepOne).toLocal8Bit());
00232   logMessage("FemalesStepOne = " + QString::number(myFemalesStepOne).toLocal8Bit());
00233   logMessage("MotherReplacementsPerYear = " + QString::number(myMotherReplacementsPerYear).toLocal8Bit());
00234   logMessage("AdditionalMothers = " + QString::number(myAdditionalMothers).toLocal8Bit());
00235   logMessage("MalesStepTwo = " + QString::number(myMalesStepTwo).toLocal8Bit());
00236   logMessage("FemalesStepTwo = " + QString::number(myFemalesStepTwo).toLocal8Bit());
00237   logMessage("TotalMothers = " + QString::number(myTotalMothers).toLocal8Bit());
00238   logMessage("TotalMales = " + QString::number(myTotalMales).toLocal8Bit());
00239   logMessage("TotalFemales = " + QString::number(myTotalFemales).toLocal8Bit());
00240   logMessage("TotalJuveniles = " + QString::number(myTotalJuveniles).toLocal8Bit());
00241   logMessage("Total Adult Females Value(Kg) = " + QString::number (myTotalMothersValueRequired).toLocal8Bit());
00242   logMessage("Total Juveniles Value(Kg) = " + QString::number (myTotalJuvenilesValueRequired).toLocal8Bit());
00243   logMessage("Total Value (Kg) Needed To Feed Animals = " + QString::number(myValueNeededToFeedAnimals).toLocal8Bit());
00244   logMessage("method ==> float LaModel::requiredValue(QString theAnimalGuid)");
00245   logMessage("Animal: " + myAnimal.name().toLocal8Bit());
00246   logMessage("Breeding Stock: " + QString::number(myTotalMothers).toLocal8Bit());
00247   logMessage("Juveniles: " + QString::number(myTotalJuveniles).toLocal8Bit());
00248   logMessage("Kg Value needed annually to feed the entire herd: " +
00249       QString::number(myReturnValue).toLocal8Bit());
00250   logMessage("^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^");
00251   return myReturnValue;
00252 }
00253 
00254 void LaModel::allocateFallowGrazingLand()
00255 {
00256   logMessage("method ==> void LaModel::allocateFallowGrazingLand()");
00257     // We need to divide the available fallow land amongst the animals
00258     // that graze fallow. We split the animal breeds by fallow land
00259     // access priority (high / medium and low priority).
00260     // e.g. We have 10 animal breeds, 6 of which graze fallow,
00261     // caw and horse are high priority, shee and pig medium,
00262     // chicken and gooxe low.
00263 
00264   float myHighPriorityCount=0, myMediumPriorityCount=0, myLowPriorityCount=0;
00265   float myHighPriorityValue=0;
00266   float myMediumPriorityValue=0;
00267   float myLowPriorityValue=0;
00268     // put starting caloric requirements of all used animals floato a map
00269     // for reduction due to grazing of fallow crop land
00270     // initialiseValueMap();
00271 
00272   float myTotalFallowValue=0;
00273 
00274     // Count the Animals in each Priority Level and sum their calorie requirements
00275   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00276   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00277   {
00278     myAnimalIterator.next();
00279     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00280     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
00281     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00282     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00283 
00284     switch (myAnimalParameter.fallowUsage())
00285     {
00286       case  High:
00287             myHighPriorityCount++;
00288             myHighPriorityValue += requiredValue(myAnimalGuid);
00289             break;
00290       case  Medium:
00291             myMediumPriorityCount++;
00292             myMediumPriorityValue += requiredValue(myAnimalGuid);
00293             break;
00294       case  Low:
00295             myLowPriorityCount++;
00296             myLowPriorityValue += requiredValue(myAnimalGuid);
00297             break;
00298       case  None:
00299             break;
00300       default:
00301             break;
00302     }   //switch
00303 
00304   }   //while animal count
00305   logMessage("High Priority Animals: " + QString::number(myHighPriorityCount).toLocal8Bit() );
00306   logMessage("Medium Priority Animals: " + QString::number(myMediumPriorityCount).toLocal8Bit() );
00307   logMessage("Low Priority Animals: " + QString::number(myLowPriorityCount).toLocal8Bit() );
00308 
00309   logMessage("High Priority Animal Calorie requirements: " + QString::number(myHighPriorityValue).toLocal8Bit() );
00310   logMessage("Medium Priority Animal Calorie requirements: " + QString::number(myMediumPriorityValue).toLocal8Bit() );
00311   logMessage("Low Priority Animal Calorie requirements: " + QString::number(myLowPriorityValue).toLocal8Bit() );
00312 
00313     //  iterate through crops to determine the total calories available to animals
00314     //  by grazing fallow crop land
00315 
00316   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
00317   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
00318   {
00319     myCropIterator.next();
00320     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
00321     QString myCropParameterGuid = myCropIterator.value();
00322     LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
00323     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
00324 
00325     float myCropPercent = 0.01 * myCropParameter.percentTameCrop();
00326     float myCropCalorieTarget = /*caloriesFromCrops()*/  myCropPercent;   // already kcalories
00327     float myCropProductionTarget = myCropCalorieTarget / (myCrop.cropCalories()/1000.);
00328 
00329     AreaUnits myCropAreaUnits = myCrop.areaUnits();
00330     float myCropYield = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(myCropAreaUnits, static_cast<float> (myCrop.cropYield()));
00331       //QString myCropParameterGuid = mCropsMap.value(theCropGuid);
00332       //LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
00333     float myFallowRatio = myCropParameter.fallowRatio();
00334     float myFallowArea = (myCropProductionTarget / myCropYield) * myFallowRatio;
00335 
00336     AreaUnits myFallowAreaUnits = myCropParameter.areaUnits();
00337     float myFallowValueBefore = myCropParameter.fallowValue();
00338     float myFallowValue = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(myFallowAreaUnits, myFallowValueBefore);
00339     float myAvailableFallowValue = myFallowRatio * myFallowArea * myFallowValue;
00340 
00341     myTotalFallowValue += static_cast<float>(myAvailableFallowValue);
00342   }   // while crop iterator
00343   logMessage("Total Available Fallow Calories before adjustments: " + QString::number(myTotalFallowValue).toLocal8Bit());
00344 
00345     // The following three if statements process all of the animals which
00346     // utilize fallow cropland as grazing land.  It first checks that there
00347     // is fallow land available, and next allocates the the fallow based on
00348     // the animals fallow access priority
00349 
00350     // HIGH priority animals get allocated fallow cropland
00351   if (myTotalFallowValue > 0)
00352   {
00353     Priority myPriority = High;
00354     float myLeftoverCalories = doTheFallowAllocation(myPriority, myTotalFallowValue, myHighPriorityValue);
00355     logMessage("Remaining Fallow Calories after HIGH adjustments: " + QString::number(myLeftoverCalories).toLocal8Bit());
00356     myTotalFallowValue = myLeftoverCalories;
00357   }
00358     // MEDIUM priority animals get allocated fallow cropland
00359   if (myTotalFallowValue > 0)
00360   {
00361     Priority myPriority = Medium;
00362     float myLeftoverCalories = doTheFallowAllocation(myPriority, myTotalFallowValue, myMediumPriorityValue);
00363     logMessage("Remaining Fallow Calories after MED adjustments: " + QString::number(myLeftoverCalories).toLocal8Bit());
00364     myTotalFallowValue = myLeftoverCalories;
00365   }
00366     // LOW priority animals get allocated fallow cropland
00367   if (myTotalFallowValue > 0)
00368   {
00369     Priority myPriority = Low;
00370     float myLeftoverCalories = doTheFallowAllocation(myPriority, myTotalFallowValue, myLowPriorityValue);
00371     logMessage("Remaining Fallow Calories after LOW adjustments: " + QString::number(myLeftoverCalories).toLocal8Bit());
00372     myTotalFallowValue = myLeftoverCalories;
00373   }
00374     //float myReturnValue = static_cast<float>(myTotalFallowValue);
00375     //return myReturnValue;
00376 }

00379 /* float LaModel::adjustForFodder(LaFoodSource theFoodSources, float theCalsRequired)
00380 {
00381     // the values given here are percentage of diet, so are easily calculated.
00382   float myStrawChaffPercentOfDiet = theFoodSources.fodder();
00383   float myGrainPercentOfDiet = theFoodSources.grain();
00384 
00385 } */
00386 
00387 float LaModel::doTheFallowAllocation (Priority thePriority,
00388                                     float theAvailableFallowValue,
00389                                     float theValueNeeded)
00390 {
00391   qDebug() << "Value Map: " << mValueMap;
00392     // when the total number of calories needed by the animals
00393     // is taken away from the total available calories (from crop fallow),
00394     // there will be one of two results.
00395     // 1. the result will be <=0, meaning that additional sources of
00396     //    food is required for the animals.  (fodder or grazing land)
00397     // 2. the result will be > 0, meaning that there is enough food value
00398     //    in the crop fallow to completely feed the animals.
00399   float myTotalFallowValue = theAvailableFallowValue - theValueNeeded;
00400   qDebug() << "myTotalFallowValue: "  << myTotalFallowValue;
00401     // set up the conditions for the fallow allocation...
00402     // there is either enough fallow to feed the animal completely
00403     // or not enough to feed them completely.  If there is enough,
00404     // the animal will not be requiring any additional source of
00405     // calories.  In other words, we won't be needing to graze them
00406     // on any other land besides the crop fallow.
00407   Status myFallowStatus;
00408   myFallowStatus = (myTotalFallowValue > 0) ? MoreThanEnoughToCompletelySatisfy : NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy;
00409   QString myFallowStatusString = (myFallowStatus!=NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy) ? "More than Enough" : "Not Enough";
00410   logMessage("Fallow Status: " + myFallowStatusString);
00411   qDebug () << "FallowStatus: " << myFallowStatus;
00412   switch (myFallowStatus)
00413   {
00414     case  MoreThanEnoughToCompletelySatisfy:
00415           {
00416             logMessage("MoreThanEnoughToCompletelySatisfy");
00417               // because there is leftover calories available to feed more critters, this
00418               // shows that all of the animals caloric requirements are met with crop fallow
00419               // and require no more feed so their values in the QMap will be set to 0
00420             QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00421             while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00422             {
00423               myAnimalIterator.next();
00424 
00425               QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00426               QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
00427               LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00428               LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00429 
00430               if (myAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==thePriority)
00431               {
00432                 mValueMap[myAnimalGuid] = 0;
00433               }   //endif (fallowUsage(myAnimalGuid)
00434 
00435              }   // while animal iterating
00436                // myTotalFallowValue += theValueNeeded;
00437              break;
00438           }
00439 
00440     case  NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy:
00441           {
00442             logMessage("CASE: NotEnoughToCompletelySatisfy");
00443               // because there ARE NO leftover Value available to feed more critters, this
00444               // shows that NOT ALL of the animals requirements are met with crop fallow
00445               // and therefore require more feed so their values in the QMap will be adjusted
00446             QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
00447             while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00448             {
00449               myAnimalIterator.next();
00450               logMessage("    Iterating through Animals looking for a match");
00451 
00452               QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
00453               QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
00454               LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00455               LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00456               float myCurrentAnimalsValue = mValueMap.value( myAnimalGuid );
00457               logMessage("       Current Animal: " + myAnimal.name());
00458               qDebug() << "        theValueNeeded: " << theValueNeeded;
00459               qDebug() << "        theAvailableFallowValue: " << theAvailableFallowValue;
00460               qDebug() << "        myCurrentAnimalsValue: " << myCurrentAnimalsValue;
00461               if (myAnimalParameter.fallowUsage()==thePriority)
00462               {
00463                 double myAllottedValue = ((myCurrentAnimalsValue / static_cast<float>(theValueNeeded)) * theAvailableFallowValue);
00464                 logMessage("Adjusting calories required by: " + myAnimal.name());
00465                 qDebug() << "myAllottedValue: " << myAllottedValue;
00466                 logMessage("Allotted Value from fallow are: " + QString::number(myAllottedValue));
00467                 logMessage("Original Value target was: " + QString::number(mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid)));
00468                 float myNewValueTarget = mValueMap.value(myAnimalGuid) - myAllottedValue;
00469                 logMessage("New Value target is: " + QString::number(myNewValueTarget));
00470                 mValueMap [myAnimalGuid] = static_cast<float>(myNewValueTarget);
00471                 myTotalFallowValue += static_cast<float>(myAllottedValue);
00472               }   // endif (fallowUsage(myAnimalGuid)==High)
00473 
00474             }   // while animal iterating
00475             logMessage("After allocation, total available Value from fallow: " + QString::number(myTotalFallowValue).toLocal8Bit());
00476             myTotalFallowValue = 0;
00477             logMessage("WHICH HAS NOW BEEN SET TO 0");
00478             break;
00479           }
00480 
00481     default:
00482           break;
00483   }   //switch
00484   return static_cast<float>(myTotalFallowValue);
00485 }

00541   myDietLabels.setCropsPortionPct(myCropsPortionPct*100.);
00542   myDietLabels.setWildAnimalPortionPct(myWildAnimalPortionPct*100.);
00543   myDietLabels.setWildPlantsPortionPct(myWildPlantsPortionPct*100.);
00544   myDietLabels.setPlantsPortionPct(myPlantsPortionPct*100.);

00598 
00608 LaDietLabels LaModel::doCalcsAnimalsFirstIncludeDiary()
00609 {
00610   LaDietLabels myDietLabels;
00611   LaAnimal myAnimal;
00612   float myKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual = mCaloriesPerPersonDaily * 365.0 * 0.001;
00613   float myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual = (myKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual*0.001) * mPopulation;
00614   float myDairyMCalorieCounter = 0.0;
00615   float myTameMeatMCalorieCounter = 0.0;
00616   float myWildMeatMCalorieCounter = 0.0;
00617   QMap <QString,QString> mySelectedAnimalsMap = mAnimalsMap;
00618 
00619   float c1 = 1. - mMeatPercent;
00620   float c8 = mDairyUtilisation;
00621   float c10= mPopulation;
00622   float c11= mCaloriesPerPersonDaily;
00623   float c14= c10*c11*365.;
00624   float c15= mDietPercent;
00625   float c12= mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops;
00626   float e15= c14*c15;
00627 
00628   //float c17=1.-mMeatPercent;
00629   //float c18=mMeatPercent;
00630 
00631   QMapIterator <QString,QString> myNextAnimalIterator(mySelectedAnimalsMap);
00632   while (myNextAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00633   {
00634     myNextAnimalIterator.next();
00635     QString myAnimalGuid = myNextAnimalIterator.key();
00636     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myNextAnimalIterator.value();
00637     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00638     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter( myAnimalParameterGuid );
00639 
00640     // adjust the milk calories to correspond to value
00641     // per kg of each live weight animal
00642     float c2 = myAnimal.milkGramsPerDay()*.001;
00643     float c3 = myAnimal.milkFoodValue();
00644     float c4 = myAnimal.lactationTime();
00645     float c5 = myAnimal.weaningAge();
00646     float c6 = myAnimal.killWeight();
00647     float c7 = myAnimal.usableMeat()*.01;
00648     float e2 = c2*c3*(c4-c5);
00649     float e3 = e2*c8;
00650     float c9 = myAnimal.meatFoodValue();
00651     float e10= e3+(c9*c7*c6);
00652     float e7 = (e15*(1.-c1))/e10;
00653     float c21=e7*e3;
00654     float c23=e7*c6*c7*c9;
00655     float c22=e15-c21-c23;
00656     
00657     myDairyMCalorieCounter    += c21;
00658     myWildMeatMCalorieCounter += c22;
00659     myTameMeatMCalorieCounter += c23;
00660     qDebug() << "c1 = " << c1;
00661     qDebug() << "c2 = " << c2;
00662     qDebug() << "c3 = " << c3;
00663     qDebug() << "c4 = " << c4;
00664     qDebug() << "c5 = " << c5;
00665     qDebug() << "c6 = " << c6;
00666     qDebug() << "c7 = " << c7;
00667 
00668     qDebug() << "c14 = " << c14;
00669     qDebug() << "e2 = " << e2;
00670     qDebug() << "e3 = " << e3;
00671     qDebug() << "e10 = " << e10;
00672     qDebug() << "e15 = " << e15;
00673     qDebug() << "e7 = " << e7;
00674 
00675 
00676   }
00677 
00678   float c24=(1.-c12)*(c14-e15);
00679   float c25=(c12)*(c14-e15);
00680   float c30=c24/c14;
00681   float c31=c25/c14;
00682 
00683   float c28=(myWildMeatMCalorieCounter)/c14;
00684   float c29=(myTameMeatMCalorieCounter)/c14;
00685   float c27=myDairyMCalorieCounter/c14;
00686     qDebug() << "c27 = " << c27;
00687     qDebug() << "c28 = " << c28;
00688     qDebug() << "c29 = " << c29;
00689   //float myCropMCalories = c14*.001*.001*mDietPercent*mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops;
00690   //float myWildPlantMCalories = c14*.001*.001*mDietPercent*(1.-mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops);
00691   //float myCropOverallPortion = myWildPlantMCalories/(c14*.001*.001);
00692   //float myWildPlantOverallPortion = myWildPlantMCalories/(c14*.001*.001);
00693 
00694   myDietLabels.setDairyMCalories(myDairyMCalorieCounter*.001*.001);
00695   myDietLabels.setCropMCalories(c25*.001*.001);
00696   myDietLabels.setWildAnimalMCalories(myWildMeatMCalorieCounter*.001*.001);
00697   myDietLabels.setWildPlantsMCalories(c24*.001*.001);
00698   myDietLabels.setDairyPortionPct(c27*100.);
00699   myDietLabels.setTameMeatPortionPct(c29*100.);
00700   myDietLabels.setCropsPortionPct(c31*100.);
00701   myDietLabels.setWildAnimalPortionPct(c28*100.);
00702   myDietLabels.setWildPlantsPortionPct(c30*100.);
00703   myDietLabels.setAnimalPortionPct(mDietPercent*100.);
00704   myDietLabels.setPlantsPortionPct((1.-mDietPercent)*100.);
00705   myDietLabels.setKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual(myKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual);
00706   myDietLabels.setMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual(myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual);
00707   return myDietLabels;
00708 }

00749   myDietLabels.setWildPlantsPortionPct(myWildPlantsPortionPct*100.);
00750   myDietLabels.setPlantsPortionPct(myPlantsPortionPct*100.);

00778 QMap<QString, float> LaModel::getAreaTargetsAnimalsMapPFDS ()

00783 
00784 QMap<QString, float> LaModel::getAreaTargetsAnimalsMapAFID ()
00785 {
00786   LaDietLabels myDietLabels;
00787   float myKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual = mCaloriesPerPersonDaily * 365.0 * 0.001;
00788   float myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual =  (myKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual*0.001) * mPopulation;
00789   float myDairyUtilisation = mDairyUtilisation;
00790 
00791   float myDairyMCalorieCounter = 0.0;
00792   QMap <QString,QString> mySelectedAnimalsMap = mAnimalsMap;
00793   QMapIterator <QString,QString> myNextAnimalIterator(mySelectedAnimalsMap);
00794   while (myNextAnimalIterator.hasNext())
00795   {
00796     myNextAnimalIterator.next();
00797     QString myAnimalGuid = myNextAnimalIterator.key();
00798     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myNextAnimalIterator.value();
00799     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
00800     LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
00801     float c2 = myAnimal.milkGramsPerDay() * 1000.;
00802     float c3 = myAnimal.milkFoodValue();
00803     float myDaysOfMilking = myAnimal.lactationTime() - myAnimal.weaningAge();
00804     float myKCaloriesFromMilk = ( myDaysOfMilking
00805                               * c3
00806                               * c2 ) / 1000.;
00807     float myMCaloriesFromMilk = myKCaloriesFromMilk / 1000.;
00808     myDairyMCalorieCounter += myMCaloriesFromMilk;
00809                 
00810     qDebug() << "Adding " << myKCaloriesFromMilk
00811         << " KCalories to total KCalories from milk which is now at: "
00812         << myDairyMCalorieCounter << "MCalories";
00813   }
00814   
00815 
00816 
00817   float myDairyMCalories = myDairyUtilisation * myDairyMCalorieCounter;
00818   float myDairyPortionPct = (myDairyMCalories) / myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual;
00819   float myAnimalsCalorieTarget = myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual * mDietPercent;
00820   float myAnimalCalsMinusDairyBit = myAnimalsCalorieTarget - myDairyMCalories;
00821 
00822   float myWildAnimalMCalories = myAnimalCalsMinusDairyBit * (1. - mMeatPercent);
00823   float myTameAnimalMCalories = myAnimalCalsMinusDairyBit * (mMeatPercent);
00824 
00825   float myWildAnimalPortionPct = myWildAnimalMCalories / myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual;
00826   float myTameMeatPortionPct = myTameAnimalMCalories / (myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual - myDairyMCalories);
00827   float myPlantsPortionPct = 1. - myWildAnimalPortionPct - myTameMeatPortionPct - myDairyPortionPct;
00828   float myCropsPortionPct = myPlantsPortionPct * (mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops);
00829   float myWildPlantsPortionPct = myPlantsPortionPct * (1. - mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops);
00830 
00831   float myCropMCalories = myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual * myCropsPortionPct;
00832   float myWildPlantsMCalories = myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual * myWildPlantsPortionPct;
00833 
00834 
00835   float myAnimalPortionPct = mDietPercent;
00836 
00837   myDietLabels.setDairyMCalories(myDairyMCalories);
00838   myDietLabels.setCropMCalories(myCropMCalories);
00839   myDietLabels.setWildAnimalMCalories(myWildAnimalMCalories);
00840   myDietLabels.setWildPlantsMCalories(myWildPlantsMCalories);
00841   myDietLabels.setDairyPortionPct(myDairyPortionPct*100.);
00842   myDietLabels.setTameMeatPortionPct(myTameMeatPortionPct*100.);
00843   myDietLabels.setCropsPortionPct(myCropsPortionPct*100.);
00844   myDietLabels.setWildAnimalPortionPct(myWildAnimalPortionPct*100.);
00845   myDietLabels.setWildPlantsPortionPct(myWildPlantsPortionPct*100.);
00846   myDietLabels.setPlantsPortionPct(myPlantsPortionPct*100.);
00847   myDietLabels.setAnimalPortionPct(myAnimalPortionPct*100.);
00848   myDietLabels.setKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual(myKiloCaloriesIndividualAnnual);
00849   myDietLabels.setMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual(myMegaCaloriesSettlementAnnual);
00850 {
00851   QMap<QString, float> myAreaTargetsAnimalsMap;
00852   return myAreaTargetsAnimalsMap;
00853 }
00854 }

00858   QMap<QString, float> myAreaTargetsAnimalsMap;

00888 
00889 // REPORTS 
00890 
00891 bool LaModel::fromXml(QString theXml)
00892 {
00893   logMessage("method ==> bool LaModel::fromXml(QString theXml)");
00894   QString myFlag;
00895   logMessage("Loading model from xml");
00896   QDomDocument myDocument("mydocument");
00897   myDocument.setContent(theXml);
00898   QDomElement myTopElement = myDocument.firstChildElement("model");
00899   if (myTopElement.isNull())
00900   {
00901       //TODO - just make this a warning
00902     logMessage("top element could not be found!");
00903   }
00904   logMessage("Model::fromXml - guid found : " + myTopElement.attribute("guid").toLocal8Bit());
00905   setGuid(myTopElement.attribute("guid"));
00906   logMessage("Model::fromXml - guid set to : " + guid().toLocal8Bit());
00907   mName=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("name").text());
00908   mPopulation=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("population").text()).toInt();
00909   mPeriod=LaUtils::xmlDecode(myTopElement.firstChildElement("period").text());
00910   mProjection=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("projection").text()).toInt();
00911   mEasting=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("easting").text()).toInt();
00912   mNorthing=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("northing").text()).toInt();
00913   myFlag = myTopElement.firstChildElement("euclideanDistance").text();
00914   if (myFlag=="1")
00915   {
00916     mEuclideanDistance=true;
00917   }
00918   else
00919   {
00920     mEuclideanDistance=false;
00921   }
00922   myFlag = myTopElement.firstChildElement("walkingTime").text();
00923   if (myFlag=="1")
00924   {
00925     mWalkingTime=true;
00926   }
00927   else
00928   {
00929     mWalkingTime=false;
00930   }
00931   myFlag = myTopElement.firstChildElement("pathDistance").text();
00932   if (myFlag=="1")
00933   {
00934     mPathDistance=true;
00935   }
00936   else
00937   {
00938     mPathDistance=false;
00939   }
00940   mPrecision=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("precision").text()).toInt();
00941   mDietPercent=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("dietPercent").text()).toInt();
00942   mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("plantPercent").text()).toInt();
00943   mMeatPercent=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("meatPercent").text()).toInt();
00944   mCaloriesPerPersonDaily=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("caloriesPerPersonDaily").text()).toInt();
00945   
00946   mBaseOnPlants=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("baseOnPlants").text()).toInt();
00947   mIncludeDairy=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("includeDairy").text()).toInt();
00948   mLimitDairy=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("limitDairy").text()).toInt();
00949   mLimitDairyPercentage=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("limitDairyPercent").text()).toInt();
00950   
00951   mDairyUtilisation=QString(myTopElement.firstChildElement("dairyUtilisation").text()).toInt();
00952   return true;
00953 }
00954 
00955 QString LaModel::toXml()
00956 {
00957   logMessage("method ==> QString LaModel::toXml()");
00958   QString myString;
00959   myString+=QString("<model guid=\"" + guid() + "\">\n");
00960   myString+=QString("  <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</name>\n");
00961   myString+=QString("  <population>" + QString::number(mPopulation) + "</population>\n");
00962   myString+=QString("  <period>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mPeriod) + "</period>\n");
00963   myString+=QString("  <projection>" + QString::number(mProjection) + "</projection>\n");
00964   myString+=QString("  <easting>" + QString::number(mEasting) + "</easting>\n");
00965   myString+=QString("  <northing>" + QString::number(mNorthing) + "</northing>\n");
00966   myString+=QString("  <euclideanDistance>" + QString::number(mEuclideanDistance) + "</euclideanDistance>\n");
00967   myString+=QString("  <walkingTime>" + QString::number(mWalkingTime) + "</walkingTime>\n");
00968   myString+=QString("  <pathDistance>" + QString::number(mPathDistance) + "</pathDistance>\n");
00969   myString+=QString("  <precision>" + QString::number(mPrecision) + "</precision>\n");
00970   myString+=QString("  <dietPercent>" + QString::number(mDietPercent) + "</dietPercent>\n");
00971   myString+=QString("  <plantPercent>" + QString::number(mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops) + "</plantPercent>\n");
00972   myString+=QString("  <meatPercent>" + QString::number(mMeatPercent) + "</meatPercent>\n");
00973   myString+=QString("  <caloriesPerPersonDaily>" + QString::number(mCaloriesPerPersonDaily) + "</caloriesPerPersonDaily>\n");
00974   
00975   myString+=QString("  <baseOnPlants>" + QString::number(mBaseOnPlants) + "</baseOnPlants>\n");
00976   myString+=QString("  <includeDairy>" + QString::number(mIncludeDairy) + "</includeDairy>\n");
00977   myString+=QString("  <limitDairy>" + QString::number(mLimitDairy) + "</limitDairy>\n");
00978   myString+=QString("  <limitDairyPercent>" + QString::number(mLimitDairyPercentage) + "</limitDairyPercent>\n");
00979 
00980   myString+=QString("  <dairyUtilisation>" + QString::number(mDairyUtilisation) + "</dairyUtilisation>\n");
00981   myString+=QString("</model>\n");
00982   return myString;
00983 }

01013 
01014 QString LaModel::toHtml()
01015 {
01016   logMessage("method ==> QString LaModel::toHtml()");
01017   QString myString;
01018   myString+="<h1>Model Report</h1>";
01019   myString+="<h3>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mName) + "</h3>";
01020     //myString+="GUID:" + guid() + "<br />";
01021   myString+="<br>Population:" + QString::number(mPopulation) + "</br>";
01022   myString+="<br>Period: " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(mPeriod) + "</br>";
01023   myString+="<br>Projection: " + QString::number(mProjection) + "</br>";
01024   myString+="<br>Easting: " + QString::number(mEasting) + "</br>";
01025   myString+="<br>Northing: " + QString::number(mNorthing) + "</br>";
01026   myString+="<br>Euclidean Distance: " + QString::number(mEuclideanDistance) + "</br>";
01027   myString+="<br>Walking Time: " + QString::number(mWalkingTime) + "</br>";
01028   myString+="<br>Path Distance: " + QString::number(mPathDistance) + "</br>";
01029   myString+="<br>Precision: " + QString::number(mPrecision) + "</br>";
01030   myString+="<br>Diet Percent" + QString::number(mDietPercent) + "</br>";
01031   myString+="<br>Plant Percent: " + QString::number(mPercentOfDietThatIsFromCrops) + "</br>";
01032   myString+="<br>Meat Percent: " + QString::number(mMeatPercent) + "</br>";
01033   myString+="<br>Calories Per Person Daily: " + QString::number(mCaloriesPerPersonDaily) + "</br>";
01034 
01035   myString+="<br>BaseOnPlants=>" + QString::number(mBaseOnPlants) + "</br>";
01036   myString+="<br>IncludeDairy=>" + QString::number(mIncludeDairy) + "</br>";
01037   myString+="<br>LimitDairy=>" + QString::number(mLimitDairy) + "</br>";
01038   myString+="<br>LimitDairyPercent=>" + QString::number(mLimitDairyPercentage) + "</br>";
01039   
01040   myString+="<br>Dairy Use: " + QString::number(mDairyUtilisation) + "</br>";
01041     //iterate through animals
01042   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myAnimalIterator(mAnimalsMap);
01043   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01044   {
01045     myAnimalIterator.next();
01046     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01047     QString myAnimalParameterGuid = myAnimalIterator.value();
01048       //QString myText = "Animal " + myAnimalGuid.toLocal8Bit() +
01049       //  " , ";
01050       //myText +=  myAnimalParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() ;
01051       //myText += " ";
01052       //myString += myText + "<br />";
01053     LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01054     myString += "<br>";
01055     myString += myAnimal.toHtml();
01056     myString += "</br>";
01057     LaAnimalParameter myParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(myAnimalParameterGuid);
01058     myString += "<br>";
01059     myString += myParameter.toHtml();
01060     myString += "</br>";
01061   }
01062 
01063     //iterate through crops
01064   QMapIterator<QString, QString > myCropIterator(mCropsMap);
01065   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01066   {
01067     myCropIterator.next();
01068     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01069     QString myCropParameterGuid = myCropIterator.value();
01070       //QString myText = "Crop " + myCropGuid.toLocal8Bit() +
01071       //  " , ";
01072       //myText += myCropParameterGuid.toLocal8Bit() ;
01073       //myText += " ";
01074       //myString += myText + "<br />";
01075     LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
01076     myString += myCrop.toHtml();
01077     myString += "<br />";
01078     LaCropParameter myParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(myCropParameterGuid);
01079     myString += myParameter.toHtml();
01080     myString += "<br />";
01081   }
01082   return myString;
01083 }

01088 }

01090 QString LaModel::toHtmlCalorieCropTargets()
01091 {
01092     // This method returns a QString for an xml file containing the calorie
01093     // targets for each crop from mCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap
01094 
01095     // Loop through the mCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap
01096   QString myString;
01097   myString += QString("<h3> Crop Calorie Targets</h3>\n");
01098   myString += QString("<table>");
01099   myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01100   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01101   myString += QString("      Crop\n");
01102   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01103   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01104   myString += QString("      kCalories\n");
01105   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01106   myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01107 
01108   QMapIterator<QString, float> myCropIterator (mCaloriesProvidedByCropsMap);
01109   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01110   {
01111     myCropIterator.next();
01112     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01113     float myCalorieTarget = static_cast <float>(myCropIterator.value());
01114     LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
01115     LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(mCropsMap.value(myCropGuid));
01116 
01117       // add to the QString to create the html file
01118 
01119     myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01120     myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01121     myString += QString("      " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myCrop.name()) + "\n");
01122     myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01123     myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01124     myString += QString("      " + QString::number(myCalorieTarget) + "\n");
01125     myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01126     myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01127 
01128 
01129       // add to the QString to create the xml file
01130       //myString += QString("  <crop>\n");
01131       //myString += QString("    <guid=\"" + myCropIterator.key() + "\">\n");
01132       //myString += QString("    <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myCrop.name()) + "</name>\n");
01133       //myString += QString("    <description>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myCrop.description()) + "</description>\n");
01134       //myString += QString("    <parameterGuid=\"" + myCropParameter.guid() + "\">\n");
01135       //myString += QString("    <name>" + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myCropParameter.name()) + "</name>\n");
01136       //myString += QString("    <calorieTarget>" + QString::number(myCalorieTarget) + "</calorieTarget>\n");
01137       //myString += QString("  </crop>\n");
01138   }   // while crop iterator
01139 
01140     myString += QString("</table>\n");
01141   return myString;
01142 }

01288 QString LaModel::toHtmlAreaCropTargets()
01289 {
01290     // This method returns a QString for an xml file containing the production
01291     // targets for each crop from mAreaTargetsCropsMap
01292 
01293     // Loop through the mAreaTargetsCropsMap
01294   QString myString;
01295   myString += QString("<h3> Crop Area Targets</h3>\n");
01296   myString += QString("<P STYLE=\"margin-bottom: 0in\"><BR>\n");
01297   myString += QString("\n");
01298   myString += QString("<table>");
01299   myString += QString("  <COL WIDTH=64*>\n");
01300   myString += QString("  <COL WIDTH=16*>\n");
01301   myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01302   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01303   myString += QString("      Crop\n");
01304   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01305   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01306   myString += QString("      Area\n");
01307   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01308   myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01309   QMapIterator<QString, float> myCropIterator (mAreaTargetsCropsMap);
01310   while (myCropIterator.hasNext())
01311   {
01312     myCropIterator.next();
01313     QString myCropGuid = myCropIterator.key();
01314     if (myCropGuid != "CommonTarget")
01315     {
01316       float myAreaTarget = static_cast <float>(myCropIterator.value());
01317       LaCrop myCrop = LaUtils::getCrop(myCropGuid);
01318       LaCropParameter myCropParameter = LaUtils::getCropParameter(mCropsMap.value(myCropGuid));
01319         // add to the QString to create the xml file
01320       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01321       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01322       myString += QString("      " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myCrop.name()) + "\n");
01323       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01324       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01325       myString += QString("      " + QString::number(myAreaTarget) + "\n");
01326       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01327       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01328     }
01329     else
01330     {
01331       QString myAreaTarget = QString::number(mAreaTargetsCropsMap.value("CommonTarget"));
01332       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01333       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01334       myString += QString("      CommonTarget\n");
01335       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01336       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01337       myString += QString("      " + myAreaTarget + "\n");
01338       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01339       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01340     }
01341   }   // while crop iterator
01342 
01343     myString += QString("</table>\n");
01344   return myString;
01345 }
01346 
01347 QString LaModel::toHtmlAreaAnimalTargets()
01348 {
01349     // This method returns a QString for an xml file containing the production
01350     // targets for each animal from mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap
01351 
01352     // Loop through the mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap
01353   QString myString;
01354   myString += QString("<h3> Animal Area Targets</h3>\n");
01355   myString += QString("\n");
01356   myString += QString("<table>");
01357   myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01358   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01359   myString += QString("      Animal\n");
01360   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01361   myString += QString("    <th>\n");
01362   myString += QString("      Area\n");
01363   myString += QString("    </th>\n");
01364   myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01365   QMapIterator<QString, float> myAnimalIterator (mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap);
01366   while (myAnimalIterator.hasNext())
01367   {
01368     myAnimalIterator.next();
01369     QString myAnimalGuid = myAnimalIterator.key();
01370     if (myAnimalGuid != "CommonTarget")
01371     {
01372       float myAreaTargetUnchanged = static_cast <float>(myAnimalIterator.value());
01373       LaAnimal myAnimal = LaUtils::getAnimal(myAnimalGuid);
01374       LaAnimalParameter myAnimalParameter = LaUtils::getAnimalParameter(mAnimalsMap.value(myAnimalGuid));
01375       float myAreaTarget = LaUtils::convertAreaToHectares(myAnimalParameter.areaUnits(), myAreaTargetUnchanged);
01376         // add to the QString to create the xml file
01377       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01378       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01379       myString += QString("      " + LaUtils::xmlEncode(myAnimal.name()) + "\n");
01380       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01381       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01382       myString += QString("      " + QString::number(myAreaTarget) + "\n");
01383       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01384       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01385     }
01386     else
01387     {
01388       QString myAreaTarget = QString::number(mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap.value("CommonTarget"));
01389       myString += QString("  <tr>\n");
01390       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01391       myString += QString("      CommonTarget\n");
01392       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01393       myString += QString("    <td>\n");
01394       myString += QString("      " + myAreaTarget + "\n");
01395       myString += QString("    </td>\n");
01396       myString += QString("  </tr>\n");
01397     }
01398   }
01399 
01400     myString += QString("</table>\n");
01401   return myString;
01402 }
01403 
01404 QMap<QString, float> LaModel::getAreaTargetsAnimalsMap()
01405 {
01406   return mAreaTargetsAnimalsMap;
01407 }
